duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting wireless and wireline network infrastructure
Managing the day-to-day operations and maintenance of network facilities
Designing circuits using Circuit Inventory System
Creating Access Service Requests (ASR) and verifying accuracy for LEC or TPV
Scheduling orders for installation, monitoring status and managing first-level escalations
Resolving situations that may delay order completion and notifying the customer if dates cannot be met
Troubleshooting to resolve network incidents and escalating issues to appropriate internal/external engineer teams for resolution
Participating in maintenance activities including installation, repairs, administration, and technical support of network equipment
Providing evaluations and reports on the status of network operations back to leadership
Providing logistical support to engineers deployed in the field, instructing on dispatch, and provisioning requests
Monitoring and tracking the status of orders and communicating with customers

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree or two or more years of work experience
